data.title: Great Family = Great local food!
data.text: This is down home Central valley Mexican food.  This is where you come for a cold drink, fresh tacos and friendly service.

data.title: Not necessarily impressed...
data.text:
Don Pepe doesn't have any type of particular authentic flavor or signature taste that sets it apart.  You can't expect to receive a traditional Mexican dish here such as enchiladas or chile relleno. 

I would say they are just ok. For the price and quick service, this does the trick if I'm ordering a basic burrito etc. The best part about this place is the salsa bar really.

data.title: El mejor!
data.text: My favorite taqueria ever. Best shrimp dishes, best red beers. Go there every chance I get. They are best known for their shrimp cocktail, which has tons of shrimp in tomato juice with onions, avocado, and spiciness. Yum.

data.title: Best Mez food!
data.text: Try the Corona Preparado! Great food, best in Fresno. I have been going here since they first opened on Blackstone. A group from my office would have lunch 2-3 times a week.

data.title: No frills good food.
data.text: If your objective is to eat no frills good Mexican food this is it.  Everything is delicious and well seasoned. Price is fair for the quality of food.

data.title: CHELADAS!!
data.text: Best Cheladas!! The food was good, prepared timely and taste was not too bad.  The shrimp cocktail was by far my favorite, but nothing compares to their Cheladas

data.title: Que rrrrrico
data.text: The shrimp botana is my treat from my boss every Friday.  It never disappoints and goes down good with a modelo which also has a shrimp in it.  Go there!

data.title: you just can't get a better fish taco.
data.text: If you want to enjoy some good comfort food, good mexican food and good service, stop by here.  The fish tacos are hands down the best.

data.title: BEST FOOD IN LITTLE SPACE
data.text:
We go to Don Pepe's for their large burritos and cani asada tacos. 
All of the staff at the Best Western Village Inn rave about the excellent food and great prices............... It's not a large enough space for the amount of customers that choose to eat in, we prefer to order and take the food back to our hotel. For a little taco stand they sure do a great job. Very satisfied .

data.title: Good foods and value
data.text: Great food and good value for your money. The owner is good and very nice to every customers except the guy that take order. While I was ordering he turns around to his coworker, says something in Spanish and laugh. I notice another one or maybe owner himself says something at the guy that was taking order. Right the way they all stop laughing and move on like nothing said. I assumed because I am an Asian eating at Mexican restaurant?

data.title: Hole in the Wall Good Eats
data.text: If you like a good burrito, this is a good place to try.  It doesn't have much to offer as far as atmosphere - in fact it's like a large kitchen - but the food is authentic and very, very tasty - If you don't care about ambience, you eat there - or you can take your food home and create your own ambience.

data.title: Great and authentic.
data.text:
Always a treat to eat here. 2 locations now but we love the original one
on Blackstone. Very busy. Order is taken at register and food gets delivered quickly.
Taco's, burritos, enchilada's and everything is great. Choices of chicken. meat and seafood.
Awesome shrimp cocktail. Self serve condiments are set up . Service is hurried but good.
There are many Taco places but this is by far our favorite.
